cr.title: Water Quality Financing Act of 2007
cr.excerpt: Madam Chairman, I ask unanimous consent to withdraw my amendment.

cr.title: Honoring the Service and Sacrifice of The 101st Airborne Division
cr.excerpt: I certainly want to thank the gentleman from Connecticut (Mr. Courtney) and the gentleman from Alabama (Mr. Rogers) as well as Chairman Skelton and Ranking Member Hunter for bringing this resolution to the floor today. As has been said, Fort Campbell, Kentucky is the home of the 101st Airborne Division known as the Screaming Eagles, which...

cr.title: Department of Homeland Security Appropriations Act, 2008
cr.topics: Department of Homeland Security Appropriations Act, 2008: ANNOUNCEMENT BY THE ACTING CHAIRMAN, PARLIAMENTARY INQUIRY
cr.excerpt: Mr. Chairman, I want to first of all thank the chairman of the subcommittee on the Democratic side and also on the Republican side for the hard work that they have shown in establishing this appropriation bill for Homeland Security. Last night I was reading a poll, and I noticed that Congress, as an institution, has an approval rating of...

cr.title: Iraq War Resolution
cr.excerpt: Madam Speaker, I believe that the American people welcome this debate on Iraq, certainly one of the most important issues facing the American people, and I believe we will all benefit from open, constructive, and sincere debate. It goes without saying that no one Member of Congress or political party has a clear-cut solution to the complex ...

cr.title: Departments of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2008
cr.topics: Departments of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2008: SUBSTANCE ABUSE AND MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES
cr.excerpt: Madam Chairman, I thank the gentleman. I am here as an advocate for the Energy and Commerce Committee. Madam Chairman, I ask unanimous consent to withdraw my amendment.
